title: whats with the ping spikes
body:
This has been an issue in the past, and now it's come up again.

All my other games it's completely fine, always 30 ping or less, but with league of legends for some reason ill have normal ping, go up to 200... and then go back down... go up to 800... go back down... go up to the thousands, keep on climbing, my game will freeze... and then come back down


This 100% is not an issue on my end, all my other games are completely fine no issues


so what's the deal?

replies.body:
Hmmmmm that kind of fluctuating ping makes me wonder if your network is having problems with packet loss. Essentially, packet loss is when some of the data going between your network and our servers gets lost or corrupted so that neither our servers or your pc can read it correctly. This can cause some preeeeetty weird stuff to happen like skyrocketing ping or champions moonwalking around and ignoring your commands. 

Check out our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) using the latest network logs of the game that had these ping spikes. That will be able to tell us just what kind of lag we're dealing with, so take a screenshot and post it here for us to go over together.
